dict.acceptation: 主要的；重要的；大调的；主修的（课程）；
主修科目；大调；陆军少校；成年的；
<美>主修，专攻；[美国英语][教育学]主修(in)；专攻；

sent.orig: Five compounds were isolated from Ajuga lupulina var.Major.
sent.trans: 从齿苞筋骨草 ( Ajuga lupulina var.Major)中分离出 5个化合物。

sent.orig: He had been plagued by one extra major, he now had an opening for one major.
sent.trans: 他对手下多一名少校一直感到心烦，这下子他可有了一个少校的空缺了。

sent.orig: Major domestic and international business major steel mills: Coil-rolled, galvanized Coil, hot-rolled, such as pickling Coil.
sent.trans: 主要经营国内外各大钢厂：冷轧卷板，镀锌卷板，热轧，酸洗卷板等。

sent.orig: Major Major floundered bewilderedly from one embarrassing catastrophe to another.
sent.trans: 梅杰少校当上中队长后稀里糊涂地碰上了一件又一件尴尬倒楣的事。

sent.orig: Sports training major is different from the PE major. It practisestwo-way choices of employment.
sent.trans: 非师范类体育专业（运动训练）不同于体育教育专业，在就业政策上实施双向选择。
